content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and the your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
I attempted to read a file but received an error due to the file not existing. I then successfully wrote to a file. The AI sent me messages to execute a shell command, list files in a specific directory (which returned no results), and execute a Python file (which returned an error due to an invalid file type). Lastly, I successfully read a file.
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "write_to_file", "args": {"filename": "<filename>", "text": "<text>"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Command write_to_file returned: Error: File has already been updated.', type='action_result')]
"""
